title: Ancient Origins | Reconstructing the story of humanity's past
cleaned_text: In the western-central arid heartland of ancient Anatolia, the river Sangarios snaked through the ancient Iron Age Kingdom of Phrygia , once a rival to Assyria in the south-east and Urartu in the...
